# [Cloud Trace](https://console.cloud.google.com/traces)
### Description:
- **Collects latency data** from applications and displays it
- Track how requests propagate through your application and receive detailed near real-time performance insights.
- Automatically analyzes all of your application's traces to generate in-depth latency reports that surface performance degradations
- Every request to your application is added to the **Trace** list
- 
### two
